casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: C-R.D.G., Minor Child No. 337P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Joyce L. Terres, Assistant Parent Defender, for Jones, James. Kathleen Arundell Jackson, Senior Associate County Attorney, for Mecklenburg County Youth and Family Services. R. Bruce Thompson, II, Attorney at Law, for GAL.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th of October 2018 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
